name: everyday/gmodstore-sdk
description: Welcome to the GmodStore API! You can use our API to access GmodStore API endpoints, which can be used interact with GmodStore programmatically.  # Rate limits Every request you make to the GmodStore API will count against your rate limit, which at the time of writing this, is 60 requests / minute. An up-to-date value will always provided in the `X-RateLimit-Limit` header The number of requests you have remaining before you must wait is provided in the `X-RateLimit-Remaining` header.  # API SDKs For a list of available API SDKs check the README here: https://github.com/everyday-as/gmodstore-api-docs#client-libraries
